name: Clockwork Revolution
description:
Our team is composed of four members:

Carlos Sousa: Carlosmvs

Joana Gonçalves: Jojo

Manuel Menezes: Space_shoe

Patrícia Henriques: Nalurianne

Note: This is still a work in progress. There are some backgrounds or sprites that are there as placeholders, or aren't the finished product that we want. We will continue developing the game during the next few weeks.

If you have any suggestions or encounter any problem, let us know!

We are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook and Twitter!
